verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3778>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> when the <S%G4129>number<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> was <S%G4129>multiplying,<s%> a <S%G1112>complaint<s%> <S%G1096>arose<s%> from the <S%G1675>Hellenists<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G1445>Hebrews,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> were <S%G3865>neglected<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2522>daily<s%> <S%G1248>service.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4341>summoned<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> "It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G701>appropriate<s%> <S%G2641>for<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2641>forsake<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G1247>serve<s%> <S%G5132>tables.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> select from among <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> good <S%G3140>report,<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we may <S%G2525>appoint<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5532>business.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> will continue <S%G4342>steadfastly<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of the <S%G3056>word.<s%>"

<S%G2532>These<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G1799><s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen,<s%> <S%G1799>a<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G4402>Prochorus,<s%> <S%G3527>Nicanor,<s%> <S%G5096>Timon,<s%> <S%G3937>Parmenas,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3532>Nicolaus,<s%> a <S%G4339>proselyte<s%> of <S%G491>Antioch;<s%>

<S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G652>apostles.<s%> <S%G2532>When<s%> they had <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> they <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G837>increased<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4970>exceedingly.<s%> <S%G3793>A<s%> <S%G4970>great<s%> <S%G3793>company<s%> of the <S%G2409>priests<s%> were <S%G5219>obedient<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> "The <S%G3032>Libertines,<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2956>Cyrenians,<s%> of the <S%G221>Alexandrians,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> of <S%G2791>Cilicia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G4802>arose,<s%> disputing with <S%G4736>Stephen.<s%>

<S%G5037>They<s%> stirred <S%G4787>up<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> came <S%G2186>against<s%> him <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4884>seized<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> him in <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4892>council,<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%> will <S%G2647>destroy<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G236>change<s%> the <S%G1485>customs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to <S%G2254>us.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G537>All<s%> who <S%G2516>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4892>council,<s%> <S%G816>fastening<s%> their eyes <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> like it <S%G5616>was<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of an <S%G32>angel.<s%>
